snippet: U-Multirank, a new international ranking system, promises to be a nuanced tool for comparing and judging universities.

byline.original: By AISHA LABI | THE CHRONICLE OF HIGHER EDUCATION

lead_paragraph: U-Multirank, a new international ranking system, promises to be a nuanced tool for comparing and judging universities.

headline.main: E.U. Seeking Better Clarity on Ratings
